title: Uwork
subtitle: UI/UX Design - Web Development
description: Uwork is a mobile application that connects jobseekers with companies looking for employees. This application aims to totally democratize and review the hiring system with a simple and easy to use application.

title: thedailyjim portfolio
subtitle: Web Design - Web Development
description: During my free time, I have another passion besides coding, it's photography. I've been passionate about the world of photography since I was young, and I love to get out of my house and capture the life and the surrounding nature.

title: Decathlon
subtitle: Web Development
description: For the recruitment process at Decathlon, I had to realize a web development exercise in order to show my abilities and to be able to integrate the front-end developers team. The exercise was to reproduce a Figma web page from scratch.
